item.title: CNN Language Detection
item.description: Colab Notebook: CNN Language Detection Description: Train various models to distinguish English, French, German and Greek languages from a picture Comparison of MLP, Simple CNN, CNN with dropout, VGG16, ResNet Visualization of results and layer activations

item.title: Contact
